title: Perm Banned Appeal
body: Hello I was recently banned from League of Legends. I love this game and unfortunately I have Tourette syndrome which is nervous system disorder involving repetitive movements or unwanted sounds. I unfortunate swear alot because of this even though I am a christian child of god. I feel bad for what I've done my parents are taking me to therapy for my ill behavior. I also have a gambling addiction, which made me spend over 1000 dollars in this game. Addiction runs in my genes. My parents recently put me on a medicine that makes me docile and calm. I am very sorry riot I will do whatever it takes to regain trust and honor in the League of Legends Community. ~ cheesycheese6

replies.body:
> have Tourette syndrome

that doesn't make you write things -_- I know someone in my friends family which is having a real problem with that illness and i saw much stuff on the tv how these people explained there lifes and how to get along. None of them had a problem with writing on a computer or with a pen. 

If you wrote any kind of insults then the reason are you, not any kind of illness. At least in my opinion.
I view them with the utmost respect
I respect muslims!

I control all my disorders by making offerings to the Chaos God Khorne.  


Blood for the Blood God.

Blood for the Blood God!
Stink for the Stink God!
And nothing for you because you're ugly!

-traditional insult
I respect muslims!
Cheese
submit a ticket but probably won't help, sorry :( . you are held responsible for your own behavior
Even though it is because of my condition? :(
It isnt though. The spasms caused by Tourette don't make you Type specific words. Don't try to use an actual Syndrom to make you look better.
Why would I lie and say I have something else even though I have Tourette's

> [{quoted}](name=cheesycheese6,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=lZmWhZ4O,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-10-10T01:30:14.413+0000)
>
> Even though it is because of my condition? :(

You may have a condition but so do other people. Riot is not aware of individual circumstances and they expect people to be able to handle themselves and know their limits. You broke the terms and conditions with your behavior. if you want to try a support ticket go for it but they likely will tell you they can't urban it but you can start over on a new account

Hey I forgive  you!

Now  make a new  account and drop  another  $1000.   

Problem solved.

And Rito, you are very welcome.

         Whats sad is that he actually spent over 1,000 on this account.

It's a free game man.  Kick this account to the curb and make a new one. I've had 4 perma-banned accounts and haven't lost a step.  I in fact collect banned accounts like feathers in my cap.   RIot is too greedy to ban IP, so yea, let it go, make a new account and give everyone hell.

They don't ban ip because of two reasons:

1. Easy to change ip 
2. Casualties of big networks. An entire campus or gaming cafe would be banned if done via ip.
